pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation and Testing for the Multivariate t-Distribution // Routines to perform estimation and inference under the multivariate t-distribution. Currently, the following methodologies are implemented: multivariate mean and covariance estimation, hypothesis testing about the mean, equicorrelation and homogeneity of variances, the Wilson-Hilferty transformation, QQ-plots with envelopes and random variate generation. Some auxiliary functions are also provided.
